greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n/lpf(n) + lpf(n) - 1, where lpf = A020639 = least prime factor.
comment: a(n) = A032742(n) + A020639(n) - 1; a(n) <= n and for n > 1 a(n) = n iff n is prime.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1001
program: (PARI) lpf(n)= { local(f); f=factor(n); return(f[1, 1]) } { for (n=2, 1000, L=lpf(n); a=n / L + L - 1; write("b064916.txt", n, " ", a) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Sep 28 2009
(PARI) a(n) = my(p = vecmin(factor(n)[,1])); n/p + p - 1; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 19 2018
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 14 2001
